definition: something used to lure fish or other animals into danger so they can be trapped or killed, to harass with persistent criticism or carping
details:
noun
- something used to lure fish or other animals into danger so they can be trapped or killed
= synonyms: lure, decoy
- anything that serves as an enticement
= synonyms: hook
verb
- to harass with persistent criticism or carping
= example: to harass with persistent criticism or carping
= synonyms: rally
- to attack with dogs or set dogs upon
= example: to attack with dogs or set dogs upon
- to lure, entice, or entrap with bait
= example: to lure, entice, or entrap with bait
